statements: SELECT * FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_status = 'open';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NLP_tasks WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_status = 'in progress';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM NLP_tasks WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY task_status DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%processing%';
SELECT task_name, task_description, created_at FROM NLP_tasks WHERE task_status = 'open' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM nlp_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM nlp_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name FROM nlp_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nlp_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM nlp_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%analysis%' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM nlp_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM nlp_tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM nlp_tasks WHERE task_id >= 2 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nlp_results WHERE task_id = 1 ORDER BY result_timestamp ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, result_data FROM nlp_tasks JOIN nlp_results ON nlp_tasks.task_id = nlp_results.task_id WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NLP_Documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM NLP_Documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NLP_Tokens WHERE token_text LIKE '%example%';
SELECT token_text, document_id FROM NLP_Tokens WHERE document_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT annotation_id, annotation_type, start_offset, end_offset FROM NLP_Annotations WHERE token_id = 'b7c030be-976a-4dd0-ad14-9459beedc1b6';
SELECT * FROM NLP_Documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM NLP_Documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT token_text, document_text FROM NLP_Tokens JOIN NLP_Documents ON NLP_Tokens.document_id = NLP_Documents.document_id;
SELECT annotation_type, start_offset, end_offset FROM NLP_Annotations WHERE annotation_type = 'noun';
SELECT document_id, COUNT(token_id) AS token_count FROM NLP_Tokens GROUP BY document_id HAVING COUNT(token_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM NLP_Documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM NLP_Documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT entity_text, entity_type FROM NLP_Entities ORDER BY entity_type DESC;
SELECT keyword_text FROM NLP_Keywords WHERE keyword_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT document_text, keyword_text, entity_text FROM NLP_Documents JOIN NLP_Keywords ON NLP_Documents.document_id = NLP_Keywords.keyword_id JOIN NLP_Entities ON NLP_Keywords.keyword_id = NLP_Entities.entity_id;
SELECT * FROM NLP_Documents;
SELECT document_text FROM NLP_Documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_text, keyword_text FROM NLP_Documents JOIN NLP_Keywords ON NLP_Documents.document_id = NLP_Keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT entity_text, entity_type FROM NLP_Entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person' ORDER BY entity_text DESC;

SELECT document_text, keyword_text, entity_text FROM NLP_Documents JOIN NLP_Keywords ON NLP_Documents.document_id = NLP_Keywords.keyword_id JOIN NLP_Entities ON NLP_Entities.entity_id = NLP_Keywords.keyword_id WHERE document_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM texts;
SELECT id, content FROM texts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT entity_type, entity_value, start_position, end_position FROM entities WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT token, position FROM tokens WHERE position <= 10 ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT id, text_id, language, created_at FROM metadata WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM texts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, content FROM texts WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT entities.entity_type, entities.entity_value, relationships.relationship FROM entities JOIN relationships ON entities.text_id = relationships.text_id WHERE entities.text_id = 5;
SELECT tokens.token, tokens.position, metadata.language FROM tokens JOIN metadata ON tokens.text_id = metadata.text_id WHERE metadata.language = 'English';
SELECT tokens.text_id, COUNT(tokens.id) AS token_count FROM tokens GROUP BY tokens.text_id HAVING token_count > 10;
